constituent: copper, metal, gold, same, monks, hood, one, mouth
heisigStory: Picture an order of monks serving as chaplains for the police force. Their special habit, made of protective metal, is distinguished by a row of copper buttons just like the "cops" they serve.
koohiiStory1: I can´t believe no one has used this one yet: Copper is metal which looks almost the same as gold. Really, look it up on Wikipedia, it´s yellow and it´s shiny (atleast in some compounds)!
koohiiStory2: Copper is an excellent conductor. In other words, it´s a metal for which the voltage is the same everywhere. That´s why it´s used for wires.
words:
銅(あかがね): copper
銅(どう): copper
